title: 数据结构
content:
1.RMQ-st表

template<class T, class Cmp = less<T>> //定义模版：数据类型和比较方式，默认广义小于
struct RMQ{
    const int n;//数组长度[0, n)
    const Cmp cmp;//比较方式
    vector<vector<T>> a;//st表
    RMQ(const vector<T>& init) : n(init.size()), cmp(Cmp()){
        int lg = log2(n);
        a.assign(n, vector<T>(lg + 1));//用n个vector<T>(lg + 1)填充a
        for (int j = 0; j <= lg; ++j){
            for (int i = 0; i + (1 << j) <= n; ++i){
                a[i][j] = (j == 0 ? init[i] : min(a[i][j - 1], a[i + (1 << (j - 1))][j - 1], cmp));
            }
        }
    }
    T range(int l, int r){//查询[l, r]
        int k = log2(r - l + 1);
        return min(a[l][k], a[r - (1 << k) + 1][k], cmp);
    }
};
RMQ<int, greater<>> rmq1;//最大值
RMQ<int, less<>> rmq2;//最小值
